titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Constantinople in the Vines of Perah, at the funerall of the vertuous and admired Lady Anne Glouer, sometime wife to the honourable Knight Sir Thomas Glouer, and then ambassadour ordinary for his Maiesty of Great Britaine, in the port of the Great Turke. By William Forde Bachelour in Diuinitie, and lately preacher to the right honourable ambassadour, and the rest of the English nation resident there. ...
titleStmt.author: Ford, William, b. 1559.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edvvard Griffin for Francis Constable, and are to be sold at his shop at the white Lyon, ouer against the great north doore of Sainte Paules,

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A-I⁴ M² .
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
